about_the_game:
※ The content of this DLC purchase will be applied immediately. This DLC purchase is not refundable.

A Battlesuit Weapon Set filled with energy from another dimension. Each weapon can only be equipped when the character already has the respective Karma.

Available until the 2019-11-06 Maintenance.

Battlesuit Weapon Set Contents:
- Battlesuit Great Sword
- Battlesuit Longbow
- Battlesuit Staff
- Battlesuit Gauntlet
detailed_description:
※ The content of this DLC purchase will be applied immediately. This DLC purchase is not refundable.

A Battlesuit Weapon Set filled with energy from another dimension. Each weapon can only be equipped when the character already has the respective Karma.

Available until the 2019-11-06 Maintenance.

name: KurtzPel - Battlesuit Weapon Set

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 6100 3.7 GHz or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750 ti or AMD Radeon™ R7 360 (VRAM 2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/60fps when graphics settings are set to "Low" (720p/60fps when "High")
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 6500 3.2 GHz or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1500X 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 ti or AMD Radeon™ RX 570 (VRAM 4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c or better)
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/40fps when graphics settings are set to "High"

short_description: ※ The content of this DLC purchase will be applied immediately. This DLC purchase is not refundable. A Battlesuit Weapon Set filled with energy from another dimension. Each weapon can only be equipped when the character already has the respective Karma. Available until the 2019-11-06 Maintenance.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Vietnamese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Portuguese - Portugal, Japanese, Thai, Polish, Hungarian
*languages with full audio support
